Disappointing - the paella here is NOT GOOD, folks! It is way too salty, and doesn't feel fully homemade... It is huge though, but given that it costs €13-18 per person, it can be... Sangria (€3.50 a glass) was OK, the tapas we tried were good (€4 for cheese-filled red peppers, €5.50 for eggplant fries).
